Package passwordGenerator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileIO
    this class can do:
    - shows a file open dialog
    - shows a file save dialog
    - shows a written done dialog
    - can write a line (as String) out into a text file
    - can append a line (as String) out into a text file
    - can append (with a tab before) a line (as String) out into a text file
    JFrameAbout
    This JFrame shows additional information to the author and the project.
    JFrameDownloadUpdate
    This JFrame download a file from the web and include a progressbar.
    JFrameNews
    This JFrame shows the current news that are downloaded from the Internet.
    JFramePasswordGenerator
    Here are the main logic operations... and the GUI.
    Language
    to set/get the displayed langugage.
    Main
    Doing nothing else create a new JFramePasswordGenerator and shows the GUI :)
    Password
    A object instance of this class "Password" has:
    - a Password (as String)
    - a MD2 Hash (as String)
    - a MD5 Hash (as String)
    - a SHA1 Hash (as String)
    - a SHA256 Hash (as String)
    - a SHA384 Hash (as String)
    - a SHA512 Hash (as String)
    - the choice of the containing (as char array) characters for a generated plain text password.
